text: Always Flying||This unit is always flying and cannot land.

Directional Shield||This unit has variable [[b]][[col:white]][[img:icon_missile_block_chance]][[/img]] Missile Block Chance[[/col]][[/b]] depending on which side of the unit is hit by a projectile.\\n\\nThe missile block chance multiplier of each direction is:\\n[[img:icon_shield_gold]][[/img]] 1.0x at the front\\n[[img:icon_shield_silver]][[/img]] 0.5x at the sides\\n[[img:icon_shield_bronze]][[/img]] 0.1x at the rear
Ballistic Plating||Clad in heavy plates designed specifically to protect against projectiles, this unit is capable of deflecting even direct cannon fire!
Boar Cavalry||This unit counts as Boar Cavalry for ability targeting

Bound Fire Daemon||[[b]][[col:white]]Bound Fire Daemons[[/col]][[/b]] cannot be [[img:icon_rout]][[/img]]routed, but they take damage when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is broken.\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Bound Fire Daemons[[/col]][[/b]] also have:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_resistance_physical]][[/img]]Physical Resistance\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_resistance_fire]][[/img]]Fire Resistance\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_fear]][[/img]]Fear and [[img:icon_terror]][[/img]]Terror Immunity\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Bound Fire Daemons[[/col]][[/b]] are also [[img:icon_unbreakable]][[/img]]Unbreakable whilst most of their [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]hit points are remaining.
360 Missile Block||This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.
Cannot Die||Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.
Cannot Run||This unit cannot run and will only move at walking pace.
Causes Fear||This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Causes Terror||This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Expert Charge Defence||When [[img:icon_braced]][[/img]]bracing, this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any attacker.
Charge Defence vs. Large||When bracing[[img:icon_braced]][[/img]], this unit negates the [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus of any large attacker.
Charge Reflection||When [[img:icon_braced]][[/img]]bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

Construct||[[b]][[col:white]]Constructs[[/col]][[/b]] cannot be [[img:icon_rout]][[/img]]routed, but take damage when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is broken.\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Constructs[[/col]][[/b]] also have:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_fear]][[/img]]Fear and [[img:icon_terror]][[/img]]Terror Immunity\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Constructs[[/col]][[/b]] may also have their [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]hit points restored and stats boosted by special characters such as the Tomb Kings Necrotect.
Contempt||Witnessing other friendly units rout will only affect this unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership if they also have the Contempt attribute.

Daemonic||[[b]][[col:white]]Daemonic[[/col]][[/b]] units cannot be [[img:icon_rout]][[/img]]routed, but take damage when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is low.\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Daemonic[[/col]][[/b]] units also have:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_resistance_physical]][[/img]]Physical Resistance\\n [[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_fear]][[/img]]Fear and [[img:icon_terror]][[/img]]Terror Immunity
Devastating Flanker||Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
Disciplined||This unit does not suffer a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership penalty when the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often. - NOT WH

Elemental||[[b]][[col:white]]Elementals[[/col]][[/b]] cannot be [[img:icon_rout]][[/img]]routed, but take damage when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]{{tr:morale}} is broken.\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Elementals[[/col]][[/b]] also have:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_resistance_physical]][[/img]]Physical Resistance\\n [[img:bullet_point]][[/img]][[img:icon_fear]][[/img]]Fear and [[img:icon_terror]][[/img]]Terror Immunity

Encourage||This unit provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Executioner||A unit with [[b]][[col:white]]Executioner[[/col]][[/b]] will execute units in combat below a 20% [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]hit points threshold.
Expendable||Witnessing friendly expendable units rout does not reduce other units' [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership, unless they are themselves expendable.
Fanatic||This unit counts as a Fanatic for ability targeting
Perfect Vigour||Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Strong Vigour||This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.
Immune to Flanking||This unit takes no penalties when flanked.
Formation Attack||The unit will try to stay in formation when in melee. Melee defence will be slightly increased.

Glorious Charge||When charging into an enemy unit:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]] Charge Bonus duration is doubled.\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] Enemy units take a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]] Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.
Goblin Infantry||This unit counts as Goblin Infantry for ability targeting
Gorger||This unit counts as a Gorger for ability targeting

Gunship||This unit relies entirely on missile attacks to deal damage and has no melee capabilities.\\n\\nGunship-type units also:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] Attack ground targets from directly above\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] Attack flying targets from range\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] Have certain riders with infinite [[b]][[col:white]][[img:icon_ammo]][[/img]] Ammunition[[/col]][[/b]]
Hell-Forged||This unit can be restored in battle by the Daemonsmith's Reforge ability.
Hide (forest)||This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Ignores damage, healing and stats from allied contact effects
Immune to Contact Effects||Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as [[img:icon_poison]][[/img]] Poison
Woodsman||This unit can pass through trees.
Immune to Psychology||The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Knight||Witnessing friendly units with the [[img:brt_peasant]][[/img]]Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership.

Kroxigor||A unit with the [[img:lzd_kroxigor]][[/img]]Kroxigor will gain the following bonuses if a unit with the [[img:lzd_skink]][[/img]]Skink Attribute is nearby:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_weapon_damage]][[/img]]Increased Weapon Strength

Mark of Khorne||A unit with the [[b]][[col:white]]Mark of Khorne[[/col]][[/b]] has:\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]][[img:icon_frenzy]][[/img]] Frenzy Passive Ability\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_resistance_magic]][[/img]] Spell Resistance\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_armour]][[/img]] Armour\\n[[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]] Reduced [[img:icon_melee_defence]][[/img]] Melee Defence

Mark of Nurgle||A unit with the [[b]][[col:white]]Mark of Nurgle[[/col]][[/b]] has:\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] [[img:icon_poison]][[/img]] Poison Contact Effect\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]] Hit Points\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_melee_defence]][[/img]] Melee Defence\\n[[img:icon_arrow_down]][[/img]] Reduced [[img:icon_melee_attack]][[/img]] Melee Attack

Mark of Slaanesh||A unit with the [[b]][[col:white]]Mark of Slaanesh[[/col]][[/b]] has:\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] [[img:icon_immpsy]][[/img]] Immune to Psychology Attribute\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] [[img:icon_strider]][[/img]] Strider Attribute\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_resistance_physical]][[/img]] Physical Resistance\\n [[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] Increased [[img:icon_speed]][[/img]] Speed

Mark of Tzeentch||A unit with the [[b]][[col:white]]Mark of Tzeentch[[/col]][[/b]] has:\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] [[img:icon_barrier_tip]][[/img]] Barrier\\n[[img:icon_arrow_up]][[/img]] [[img:icon_magical_attacks]][[/img]] Magical Attacks
Moulder Monster||This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.
Fire Whilst Moving||This unit can fire while on the move.
Nasty Skulker||This unit counts as a Nasty Skulker for ability targeting
Night Goblin Archer||This unit counts as a Night Goblin Archer for ability targeting
Ogre Charge||When attacking [[img:icon_braced]][[/img]]braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.
Immense Ogre Charge||When attacking [[img:icon_braced]][[/img]]braced charge defenders, this unit only loses a quarter of its [[img:icon_charge]][[/img]]charge bonus.
Orc Infantry||This unit counts as Orc Infantry for ability targeting
Peasant||A unit with the [[img:brt_peasant]][[/img]]Peasant Attribute will gain increased leadership if a unit with the [[img:brt_knight]][[/img]]Knight Attribute is nearby.

Rampage||A [[b]][[col:red]]Rampaging[[/col]][[/b]] unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.\\nWhen there are no enemy units nearby, a [[b]][[col:red]]Rampaging[[/col]][[/b]] unit will move around randomly instead.
Scrolls of Sorcery||When this unit casts a spell, all of their spells will be randomly replaced by another spell.

Revealed||This unit is permanently visible to the enemy, regardless of line of sight.\\n\\n[[b]][[col:white]]Revealed[[/col]][[/b]] units are not affected by the following attributes:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_hide_forest]][[/img]]Hide Forest\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_stalk]][[/img]]Stalk\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_unspottable]][[/img]]Unspottable
Silenced||This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.

Skink||A unit with the [[img:lzd_skink]][[/img]]Skink Attribute will gain the following bonuses if a unit with the [[img:lzd_kroxigor]][[/img]]Kroxigor Attribute is nearby:\\n[[img:bullet_point]][[/img]] [[img:icon_fear]][[/img]] Causes Fear
Slayer||This unit is a Slayer. Slayers can never have their [[img:icon_weapon_damage]][[/img]]Weapon Strength reduced during a battle.
Snipe||This unit remains hidden while firing.
Mastery of Elemental Winds||When two or more units in the same army share this attribute, [[img:icon_spell_mastery]][[/img]] intensity increases the power of spells cast.
Spider||This unit counts as a Spider for ability targeting
Squig||This unit counts as a Squig for ability targeting
Squig Herd||This unit counts as a Squig Herd for ability targeting
Stalk||This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Strider||Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
Troll||This unit counts as a Troll for ability targeting
Unbreakable||This unit does not suffer any form of [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership loss and will never rout.
Underground||The Dread Maw is underground. It cannot be attacked but neither can it attack in turn.
Unspottable||If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.
Unyielding Assault||This unit can never have its [[img:icon_melee_attack]]Melee Attack[[/img]] reduced during battle.

Wallbreaker||Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a [[img:ui/skins/default/weapon_building_damage_modifier.png]][[/img]] [[col:green]]+50%[[/col]] damage multiplier against buildings.
Yang||This unit counts as a Yang unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity
Yin||This unit counts as a Yin unit for the purpose of Battle Harmony proximity.
